name: Contactually, Inc.
description: Provider of a cloud-based intelligent customer relationship management (CRM) platform intended to offer relationship management and engagement services to service-oriented professionals. The company's platform facilitates personal engagement at scale, resulting in more leads, referrals and increased business, enabling estate professionals and brokers to maximize agent adoption, review key performance metrics and communicate effectively with their agents.
one_liner: Provider of a cloud-based intelligent customer relationship management (CRM) platform intended to offer relationship management and engagement services to service-oriented professionals. The company's platform facilitates personal engagement at scale, resulting in more leads, referrals and increased business, enabling estate professionals and brokers to maximize agent adoption, review key performance metrics and communicate effectively with their agents.
